Quincy.Boston Consumptives Hospital: The Boston Consumptives Hospital (Boston Sanatorium) is a historic tuberculosis hospital at 249 River Street in the Mattapan neighborhood of Boston, Massachusetts. It consists of a complex of eighteen historic buildings on 52 acres (21 ha) of land. Most of these buildings were built between 1908 and 1932, although the Superintendent's House predates the hospital's construction; it is an Italianate house built c.
